Articles.Content:
Hello everyone, this is my first time posting here.. I've been addicted to the Kerbs for about 3 weeks now.. It started out simple enough. "Hey I'll give that a try" Next thing I know I'm selling everything I have to get my fix. I lost my job, my cat, even my car to the Kerbs.. I've tried to quit too many times to count. But every morning I wake up and it's the same thing, "Just one more rocket, then I'll quit for good." I can't shake it man.. It's ruined my life and I need help..

But seriously though, love the game! It's been awesome coming up with whatever craziness I can, and see if it will get into orbit. Seems like a cool community to be had with the game as well, so I figured I'd stop in and see what's going on.
Yeah, this is the right place for you. I am currently de-orbiting from Jool, so things are getting pretty hot. more details later

Just make sure RL takes priority in all seriousness

Have fun!

Welcome to the community Dr. Beardface

And it's a great community here, best I've seen anyway I'm sure you'll enjoy it here!

So have fun on the forums, and fly safe

Just make sure RL takes priority in all seriousness

Have fun!

Of Course! That whole thing I said was a joke, meant to be like an addicts support group intro, but point taken none the less

It's BeardfacÃƒÂ©, dammit!

I love your username, and scrubs!
